data.title: Private All Boys Prep School in Mendota Heights, Minnesota
data.meta_description: Saint Thomas Academy is an all boys private prep school serving Mendota Heights, St. Paul, & Eagan. Strong academics & athletics programs. Learn more!
data.text:
The New Uniform Sale on Tuesday, August 13 from 10:00 a.m. – 5:00 p.m. and Wednesday, August 14 from 3:00 p.m. – 6:00 p.m. in the Founder’s Hall Court.

All students will need to sign-up for an appointment to shop each sale. Appointments will be set up through Sign Up Genius links, links to sign-up will be emailed soon.

More Information Here
